granel-titulo: Make your own combination of bulk products!
granel-info:
Choose up to 4 different potato varieties in bulk format (1,250 kg) and fill a 5kg box.
Try them all and refill the box with your favorites!
producto-anadido: Product successfully added to your cart
carrito-no-valido:
NOTICE
Your cart contains products in bulk format that do not add multiples of 5Kg. Please check your purchase. Remember that each unit of bulk product is 1,250 Kg.
